main event: 11 lights, approximately 2 feet in diameter, hovered in the sky for 10-15 seconds and then disappeared behind a hill. The lights reappeared about 500 feet higher and then disappeared again.
interesting points: The lights were observed by a civilian employee of the Naval Ammunition Depot in Crane, Indiana and a member of the local police.
The object was circular in shape and appeared to be illuminated.
The object flew towards the Crane area and passed over the highway before disappearing behind a hill.
The weather report indicated the wind was from the southwest during the sighting, varying from 10 to 15 knots per hour.
No other reports of the light were called to the attention of the Commanding Officer of the Naval Ammunition Depot.
witnesses: civilian employee of the Naval Ammunition Depot and a member of the local police
